colony.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a country or area that is under the political control of a more powerful country, usually one that is far away
colony.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Algeria was formerly a French colony.
colony.translation[0].definitions[1].def: one of the 13 areas of land on the east coast of North America that later became the United States
colony.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a group of people who are similar in some way and who live together, or the place where they live
colony.translation[0].definitions[3].def: a group of animals or plants of the same type that are living or growing together
